title: Smart Data Models - GovHydroPID2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Hydro turbine and governor. Represents plants with straight forward penstock configurations and three term electro-hydraulic governors (i.e. Woodard electronic).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovHydroPID2

atw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Factor multiplying Tw (Atw).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

d.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine damping factor (D).  Unit = delta P / delta speed.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

feedbackSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback signal type flag (Flag). true = use gate position feedback signal false = use Pe. Default: False

g0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate opening at speed no load (G0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

g1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intermediate gate opening (G1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

g2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intermediate gate opening (G2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening (Gmax).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum gate opening (Gmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative gain (Kd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reset gain (Ki).  Unit = PU/ sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Proportional gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

p1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power at gate opening G1 (P1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

p2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power at gate opening G2 (P2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

p3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power at full opened gate (P3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

rperm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent drop (Rperm).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller time constant (Ta) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate servo time constant (Tb) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

treg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed detector time constant (Treg).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

velmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening velocity (Velmax).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

velmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate closing velocity (Velmin).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
